title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act 

2017 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal justice (victims crime) act 2017 (commencement) order 2022

title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act
heading: 2. The 30th day of June 2022 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of June 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 
30(b)(ii) of the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act 2017 (No. 28 of 2017) 
shall come into operation for a Special Criminal Court. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 June, 2022. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [309] 3
